# SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.onDemand

**Case**

Load the node’s external comment only when the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/load()] method is called.

## Declaration

```swift
case onDemand
```

## Constants

- **SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.immediate**: Load the node’s external content immediately when the reference node is unarchived.

items.description: Load the node’s external content immediately when the reference node is unarchived.
items.name: SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.immediate
